FENJ
Salamander

Infinite Lives [ZiT]
0047C6B4 00000063

Invincible [ZiT]
0047C6F4 00000023

Infinite Force [ZiT]
0047C6F2 00000005

Parameter Change [ZiT]
0047C6E8 000000xx
xx=Parameter
00=Off
01=SPEED
02=MISSILE
03=DOUBLE
04=LASER
05=OPTION
06=FORCE FIELD

0047C6E6 00000003

0047C6F6 00000002
